Constructors

FleeWhenScaredData(float, float, float, int, float, float, float, float)

Contains data pertaining to creating the FleeWhenScared CreatureAction.

public FleeWhenScaredData(float evaluatePriority, float swimVelocity, float swimInterval = 1, int avoidanceIterations = 10, float swimTiredness = 0.2, float tiredVelocity = 3, float swimExhaustion = 0.25, float exhaustedVelocity = 1)

Parameters

evaluatePriority float

The priority for this CreatureAction, expected to be in the range [0, 1].

swimVelocity float

Default swim speed when swimming.

swimInterval float

Interval between swimming.

avoidanceIterations int

The quality of the terrain avoidance.

swimTiredness float

How tired this creature gets while fleeing, each second.

tiredVelocity float

The velocity when tired.

swimExhaustion float

How exhausted the creature gets while fleeing, each second.

exhaustedVelocity float

The velocity when exhausted (after fleeing too long).
